title: Add /study blog feature
description:
Blog section at /study following 'rooms in a house' metaphor.

Tech: react-markdown, gray-matter, shiki
Routes: /study (index), /study/$slug (post)
Content: src/content/study/*.{en,de}.md

Frontmatter schema:
- title: string
- publishedAt: string (YYYY-MM-DD)
- excerpt: string
- tags: code | philosophy | tools | career | learning
- draft?: boolean

File structure:
- src/content/study/ - markdown posts
- src/lib/study/ - posts.ts, types.ts, readingTime.ts
- src/routes/study/ - index.tsx, $slug.tsx
- src/components/study/ - StudyPostCard, StudyPostMeta, StudySidebar, StudyPostContent
- src/texts/domains/ - study.en.ts, study.de.ts

title: Typo: Add missing components & CV migration
description:
Missing Typo components (priority in parens):
- Lead - larger intro paragraphs (medium)
- Small - caption text (medium)
- Large - emphasized text (low)
- Blockquote - quoted blocks (low)
- InlineCode - inline code snippets (low)
- UnorderedList, OrderedList - styled lists (low)

CV migration (print-specific styles need care):
- cv/CvHeader.tsx - h1
- cv/CvJob.tsx - h3, p
- cv/CvProject.tsx - h3
- cv/CvSection.tsx - h2

API: <Typo.H2 color="accent" variant="decorated">
Props: color (main|support|minor|accent|accentAlt), variant (element-specific)
